subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The defending World Cup champion Italy was drawn with France, the Netherlands and Romania in what appears to be the most difficult first-round group for Euro 2008. The tournament opens June 7. The final is in Vienna on June 29.
snippet: The defending World Cup champion Italy was drawn with France, the Netherlands and Romania in what appears to be the most difficult first-round group for Euro 2008. The tournament opens June 7. The final is in Vienna on June 29.
